org.jpac.alarm

Class AlarmQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.jpac.alarm.AlarmQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class AlarmQueue
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    central registry for all alarms instantiated inside an application implemented as singleton
